mapper.update: insert into tbl_like_pboard(product_code,user_nickname,lovecondition,lcode) values(#{productCode},#{userNickname},true,#{lcode}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE lovecondition = true;
update tbl_like_pboard set lovecondition=false where product_code=#{productCode} and user_nickname=#{userNickname}
mapper.select: select lovecondition from tbl_like_pboard where product_code=#{productCode} and user_nickname=#{userNickname}
